meanings.sent1: The gus of wind blew the leaves off the tree.
meanings.sent2: I felt a gus of wind as I walked by the open window.
meanings.sent3: The gus of wind made my hat fly off!
meanings.sent4: The gus of wind carried the kite high into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected gus of wind startled the birds in the park.

meanings.definition: To eat or drink quickly and greedily.
meanings.sent1: He gus his food down before heading out.
meanings.sent2: She always gus her coffee in the morning rush.
meanings.sent3: The hungry dog tried to gus down the entire steak in one bite!
meanings.sent4: The kids gus their snacks like they haven't eaten all day.
meanings.sent5: I watched him gus down the water as if he had been stranded in a desert.

meanings.sent1: Gus is a friendly name that many people like.
meanings.sent2: I met a guy named Gus at the party last night.
meanings.sent3: Gus, the cat, enjoyed basking in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: She called out Gus, but no one responded.
meanings.sent5: The name Gus always reminds me of my grandfather.
